sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_action_type_definition"><sys_hub_action_type_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><acls/><action_status/><action_template/><active>true</active><annotation/><callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api><category display_value="Journals">7f195bde1bc784501793319acd4bcbdc</category><compiler_build>glide-sandiego-12-22-2021__patch3-04-27-2022_05-11-2022_1201.zip</compiler_build><copied_from>8eec9e021b0b44501793319acd4bcb2d</copied_from><copied_from_name>Post Journal Entry</copied_from_name><description><p>Posts a journal entry to a GL account in SAP ECC – RFC.</p><p><strong>Inputs</strong> :</p><ul><li><strong>Connection Alias</strong> - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.</li><li><strong>Document Header</strong> - Complex object containing these fields:<ul><li>Reference procedure</li><li>Object key</li><li>Log system source</li><li>Business Transaction</li><li>User Name</li><li>Document Header Text</li><li>Company Code</li><li>Document Date</li><li>Posting Date</li><li>Fiscal Year</li><li>Posting period</li><li>Document type</li></ul></li><li><strong>G/L Accounts</strong> - Objects containing these fields:<ul>
<li>Position</li>
<li>G/L Account</li>
<li>Text</li><li>Statistical</li><li>Logical Transaction</li><li>Document Number</li><li>Reference Key 1</li><li>Reference Key 2</li><li>Reference Key 3</li><li>Transaction</li><li>Account type</li><li>Document type</li><li>Company Code</li><li>Business Area</li><li>Functional Area</li><li>Plant</li><li>Posting period</li><li>Fiscal Year</li><li>Posting Date</li><li>Value date</li><li>FM Area</li><li>Customer</li><li>W/o Cash Dscnt</li><li>Vendor</li><li>Assignment</li><li>Tax Code</li><li>Tax Jurisdiction</li><li>External object</li><li>Business Scenario</li><li>Cost Object</li><li>Cost Center</li><li>Activity Type</li><li>Profit Center</li><li>Partner Profit Ctr</li><li>Network</li><li>WBS element</li><li>Order</li><li>Order item number</li><li>Opertn task list no</li><li>Activity</li><li>Condition Type</li><li>Numerator</li><li>Level Number</li><li>Fund</li><li>Funds center</li><li>Commitment item</li><li>Business Process</li><li>Asset</li><li>Sub-number</li><li>Billing Type</li><li>Sales Order</li><li>Sales order item</li><li>Distribution Channel</li><li>Division</li><li>Sales Organization</li><li>Sales Group</li><li>Sales Office</li><li>Sold-To Party</li><li>Subseq debit/credit</li><li>Elimination PrCtr</li><li>Quantity updating</li><li>Quantity</li><li>Base Unit of Measure</li><li>Base Unit ISO code</li><li>Invoiced Quantity</li><li>Billing qty in SKU</li><li>Sales Unit</li><li>Sales unit in ISO</li><li>Qty in OPUn</li><li>Order price unit</li><li>Pur Ord PU ISO</li><li>Qty in unit of entry</li><li>Unit of Entry</li><li>Unit of entry ISO</li><li>Volume</li><li>Volume unit</li><li>Volume unit ISO</li><li>Gross Weight</li><li>Net weight</li><li>Weight unit</li><li>Unit of weight ISO</li><li>Item Category</li><li>Material</li><li>Material Type</li><li>Movement indicator</li><li>Revaluation</li><li>Origin group</li><li>Material origin</li><li>Serial no acct asset</li><li>Partner</li><li>Trading part BA</li><li>Trading Partner</li><li>Valuation Area</li><li>Valuation Type</li><li>Reference date</li><li>Purchasing Document</li><li>Item</li><li>Item (SD)</li><li>Condition Category</li><li>Functional Area</li><li>Commitment item</li><li>Grant</li><li>Transaction type</li><li>Funded Program</li><li>Segment</li><li>Partner Segment</li><li>Earmarked Funds</li><li>Document Item</li><li>Billing Period of Performance Start Date</li><li>Billing Period of Performance End Date</li><li>PPA Exclude Ind</li><li>Fast Pay Indicator</li><li>Partner Grant</li><li>Budget Period</li><li>Par Budget Per</li><li>Partner Fund</li><li>Document item number for tax document</li><li>Payment Type</li><li>Expense Type</li><li>Program Profile</li><li>Material</li></ul></li><li><strong>Currency Items</strong> - Objects containing these fields:<ul><li>Position</li><li>Crcy type/val view</li><li>Currency</li><li>ISO code currency</li><li>Amount</li><li>Exchange rate</li><li>Indirect quoted exchange rate</li><li>Tax Base Amount</li><li>Discount Base</li><li>Discount amount</li><li>Tax Amount</li></ul></li><li><strong>Additional Fields</strong> - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.</li></ul>
<p><strong>Outputs</strong> :</p><ul><li><strong>Journal Entry Data</strong> - Journal entry document details.</li><li><strong>Status</strong> - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.</li><li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.</li></ul>
<p><strong>Error Messages</strong> :</p><ul><li>Encountered an error. Check log for more details.</li></ul><br><p>To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. <a href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias" target="_blank">Learn More</a></p><p> </p><p><strong>Note</strong>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information" target="_blank">Read More</a>.</p></description><ih_action>false</ih_action><internal_name>post_journal_entry</internal_name><label_cache>[{"name":"{{action.journal_entry_document}}","label":"action➛Journal Entry
